title: Visiri Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
edhuvarai pogalaam
endru nee sollavendum
endruthaan
vidaamal ketkiren

How far can we go?
Is the question
I keep asking you
till you answer me….

thaen muththangal
mattume podhum endru
solvathaal
thodaamal pogiren.

I go without
touching you
since you said
sweet kisses are enough.

yaar yaaro kanaakalil
naalum nee sendru
ulaavukindraval
nee kaanum kanaakalil
varum  or aan endraal
naanthaan ennaalilum

You are the  girl
in every boys
dream.
But I am only boy
in your dream
always.

poongaatre
nee veesaathe
oh ooo oh...
poongaatre
nee veesaathe
naanthaan ingae visiri

Hey breezy wind
don’t blow
..oh...
Hey breezy wind
don’t blow
I’m her fan here.

en veettil nee nirkindraai
adhai nambaamal ennai
killikonden

you’re in my home
I pinched myself
to trust .

thottathil nee nirkindraai
unai poovendru enni
koyyachchendren.

You’re in the garden
I am trying to
pluck you like a flower.

pugazh poomaalaigal
thaen solaigal
naan kandaen
yaen un pin vandhen

Your fame.
Honey fields.
I saw in you and
Just came behind you;.

perum kaasolaigal
pon aalaigal
vendaame nee
vendumendren
uyire

Lot of money
Big shops
I don’t want any
Other than you.
my heart.

netrodu en vegangal
siru theeyaaga maari
thoongakkanden

My swiftness changed
small sparks
from yesterday.

kaatrodu en kobangal
oru thoosaaga maari
pogakanden

My anger dissolved
in air like
a dust.

unai paarkaatha naal
pesaaatha naal
en vazhvil veen
aagindra naal

Day’s without
seeing, talking to you
are waste
in my life.

thinam nee vandhathaal
thozh thanthathaal
aanen naan aanandha
penn paal.
uyire.

since you came daily
and gave your shoulders
I became happy
feminine.
my soul.

edhuvarai pogalaam
endru nee sollavendum
endruthaan
vidaamal ketkiren

How far can we go?
Is the question
I keep asking you
till you answer me….

thaen muththangal
mattume podhum endru
solvathaal
thodaamal pogiren.

I go without
touching you
since you said
sweet kisses are enough.

unpondra ilainganai
manam yaerkkaamal
marupathe pizhai

It is a mistake
to refuse
a male like you

kanden un alaadhi
thooimaiyai
en kan paarthu
pesum
peraanmaiyai

I found superb
holiness and
manliness of
seeing eyes and
speaking, within you

poongaatre
nee veesaathe
oh ooo oh...
poongaatre
nee veesaathe
naanthaan ingae visiri

Hey breezy wind
don’t blow
..oh...
Hey breezy wind
don’t blow
I’m her fan here.
